Method keeps the client updated with all news related to mail account.

Regular expressions to check if email address belongs to classic email pattern

Button used to reply mail to certain receivers
reply() - Method in class mailProject.client.ViewMailController
Method invoked when button reply is pressed, loads write mail view, hooks controller to view, initializes model and email fields to model current email fields
replyAll - Variable in class mailProject.client.ViewMailController
Button used to reply mail to all receivers
replyAll() - Method in class mailProject.client.ViewMailController
Method invoked when button reply to all is pressed, resets current email in model, loads write mail view, hooks controller to view, initializes model and email fields to model current email fields, except for receivers list, where removes own mail address and adds former sender mail address

Class handling life cycle mail application requests

run() - Method in class mailProject.server.LoginHandler
Method needed by thread interface, conducts mainly the request, gets user from client input, if not exists, it's created in local, otherwise gets his info from takeUser, sends it back and add the event to controller loglist.
run() - Method in class mailProject.server.RequestHandler
Method run after thread is created, it has all operations user can do.
